docs.title: LinkML Microschema Profile
docs.text:
A LinkML schema defining the Microschema Profile for composable data elements. Microschemas are designed for inline composition without identifiers.

URI: https://w3id.org/linkml/linkml-microschema-profile

Name: linkml-microschema-profile

docs.title: Class: ClinicalMeasurementRecord
docs.text:
A data structure with key and value attributes that represents a single observation. This can include results of clinical labs, scores and indices, socioeconomic, or behavioral observations.

URI: bdchm:Observation
